import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { addToChart } from '../features/chart' const SingleItemCart = ({item, deleteItem}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() function addOtherItem(){ dispatch(addToChart(item)) } return (

{item.title}

Price: {item.price}

Quantity: {item.quantity}

Total price: {item.totalPrice.toFixed(2)}

) } export default SingleItemCart
